fields.text: Welcome to Palo Alto Staffing, South Bay's professional recruiting agency where guaranteed results start with your free consultation.
Press [INDEX] if you are an employer seeking top Silicon Valley talent.
Press [INDEX] for personalized staffing consultation and job requisition services.
Please hold while we connect you to a staffing consultant who will help you secure top candidates.
Press [INDEX] for assistance with employer account management and billing inquiries.
Please hold while we reach an account specialist to assist you with your billing or account questions.
Press [INDEX] if you are a candidate seeking employment opportunities.
Press [INDEX] to explore current job openings and submit your application.
Please hold while we connect you to our candidate services team to discuss job opportunities.
Press [INDEX] for support with your candidate account and application status.
Please hold while a candidate support representative reviews your account and will be with you shortly.
